transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir Sandhya bol rahi thi India Mart head office se senior manager aap free ho
Customer: Haan haan
Executive: Sir do minute ka discussion karna tha aapne morning mein call kara tha na India Mart customer care par
Customer: Mera gateway payment kahan gaya hai pay with India Mart wo kahan chala gaya
Executive: Sir pay with India Mart to bahut time pehle band ho chuka hai
Customer: Kyun band ho chuka hai jab main MDC jab aap log paisa liya MDC ke liye us time mere ko mere agreement mein tha pay with India Mart hai
Executive: But sir wo 2024 ka agreement tha 2025 ke agreement mein nahi tha ki hum aapko pay with India Mart provide karenge ab
Customer: Sir for aap logon ki safety ke liye hi ha mera safety ke liye wo theek hai mera party kafi sara party bola hum direct payment nahi kare pay with India Mart karenge to pay with India Mart jab dega to kahan gaya wo option kahan gaya mera baat suniye main ek ek account number ka ye bata raha hai all Abbas international us company us company mein pay with India Mart hai lekin mere paas kyun nahi hai
Executive: Kis company mein hai sir pay with India Mart aap company name batayenge mujhe
Customer: Haan haan company name aap ek baar batayiye sir
Executive: All Abbas international
Customer: Phone number batayenge phone number bata rahe likhiye
Executive: Bataye bataye sir
Customer: 799
Executive: 799
Customer: 99
Executive: 99
Customer: 753
Executive: 753
Executive: Al Abbas international ki baat kar rahe hain aap
Customer: Haan isme pay with India Mart hai lekin mere paas kyun nahi hai
Executive: Kahan hai sir isme pay with India Mart
Customer: Usme hai na humne payment kiya
Executive: Ek second rukiye sir wo bhi check kar leti hu pay with India Mart to nahi hai unke paas bhi kyunki tab hi nahi hai to pay with India Mart aap kaise hai hi nahi sir tab unke paas bhi
Customer: Tab nahi hai
Executive: Nahi dekho na unka bhi same profile hai sir jaise aapka profile hai na
Customer: Mera partnership company hai wo wala
Executive: Same profile hai bhale hi aapka partnership company ho sir kab aapne usse payment uthaya tha pay with India Mart se
Customer: se saat mahine pehle uthaya tha
Executive: Haan to ye band ho chuka hai na sir ab ab aap utha ke dekho nahi milega
Customer: band ho chuka hai aap bola do saal mein band ho chuka hai pehle
Executive: Nahi nahi wo unko pata nahi hai na wo new hai system mein unko system mein join kare hue hi three months hue hain sir three months abhi do mahine complete wo wala account main bhi dekhta hai na wo wala account main bhi kabhi kabhi khulta hai usme
Executive: Abhi aap open karke dekho usme pay with India Mart available nahi hai sir
Customer: Maine aaj khola tha
Executive: Sir aap app bhi kholo sab kuch khol lo
Executive: Pay with India Mart working hai hi nahi India Mart pe abhi che saat mahine ho chuke isko already band hue
Customer: Tabhi mere ko mere party se payment lena hai wo credit card mein payment karega usko kya system hai bataye credit card through wo link bhejenge tabhi wo payment kar payenge
Executive: Koi party payment karega credit card through
Executive: Abhi hum aap logon ko koi bhi link vagera nahi provide kara rahe hain aap online bhi check karo march sixth ko update aa gaya tha ki humne ye pay with India Mart band kar diya hai
Customer: Achcha
Executive: Haan ji
Executive: 35
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asks about Pay with IndiaMART option.

- Customer states another company has Pay with IndiaMART.

- Customer needs to receive payment via credit card.



Resolution:

- Executive informed Pay with IndiaMART is discontinued.

- Executive clarified the other company does not have it.

- Executive stated no payment links are being provided.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, pay with indiamart, credit card, link
